attributes.additional_details: We the unsigned petition the government to enshrine in law our opposition to a change in the law enabling euthanasia.  Those who believe that to do so will help a minority fail to take into account that to change the law will, by the very nature of humanity, open wide the door to murder.   The elderly and disabled would be particularly vulnerable regardless of what ‘safe guards’ those in favour of euthanasia euphemistically want to believe in.
